overview: An aspiring actor in Hollywood meets an enigmatic stranger by the name of Tommy Wiseau, the meeting leads the actor down a path nobody could have predicted; creating the worst movie ever made.
tagline: Based on the true story of one movie so bad it became infamous.
title: The Disaster Artist

cast.name: Vince Chavez
cast.character: Movie Premiere Attendee in Blue Shirt (uncredited)

actors_characters.character: Movie Premiere Attendee in Blue Shirt (uncredited)
